item.description:
Where: Panera Bread, 797 Providence Hwy, (Route 1), Dedham, MA
When: Sunday, July 25th from 6:30 to 8:30 PM
Cost: The Meetup is FREE. Food and beverage is at your expense.

We are organizers of 4 Meetup sites and all members are invited to Panera Bread this Sunday, July 25th at 6:30 PM.

Please RSVP "Yes" or "Maybe" and be aware that we are expecting a very good turn-out between all 4 groups.

Let's meet new singles over a cup of coffee, sandwich or dessert and enjoy each other's company

AND

We will be offering you a one-time special discount price for our August 15th trip to scenic Mystic, CT and Foxwoods/MGM Grand with the Broadway show, "Cirque Dreams Jungle Fantasy".

See you there.

Barry and Stan

group.name: Boston/Burbs Life after Divorce Social Group

item.name: Summer Meetup at Panera Bread in Dedham
